content: learn how to create this cute penguin amigurumi with this free penguin crochet pattern this is an easy to crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes about 1 to 2 hours you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini penguin from sport weight cotton yarn and one with bulky velvet yarn and one from chenille super bulky plush yarn the pattern has a full video included on how to make this cute penguin amigurumi link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-penguin-crochet-pattern/ link to video tutorial https //youtu be/bqctcvf89jo
